summary: This mod adds two new mage robes that are inspired by the great RPG Gothic! It also adds a new \"desintigration\" Spell
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Orange][size=+5]Gothic Mage Robes[/size][/color][/b][/font] [font=Palatino Linotype][b][size=+5][/size][/b][/font] [font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Orange][size=+5]by JackoO[/size][/color][/b][/font]

[b][color=red]If you want to reupload this mod, please ask me for permission first. I don\'t want to see the files reuploaded on another site - so you may only upload your .esp and give a link to this site for the ressources. Thanks, and have fun with it![/color][/b]


[b][color=red]Please read this before download![/color][/b]

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Description:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
 

This mod adds two mage robes into skyrim that are inspired by the great RPG Gothic. Additionally, it adds a new desintigration spell. You can buy both, the robes and the spellbook from a new vendor that is located within the academy of winterhold (Firemage Master Pyrokahr is sandboxing in the yard)

There is NO separate version of female armors! This is mainly for male characters!

 [font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Content:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
this mod includes:
New Firemage Robe
New Watermage/Icemage Robe
New Spell, called \"desintigrate\"


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Installation:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Copy the the files into your data folder in your personal skyrim game folder.
Start the skyrim launcher, check the \"JooMagicMod01.esp\" and start game


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
uncheck JoOsSkyrimKnightlyArmory.esp in skyrim launcher
delete the .esp file and the following:

JooMagicMod01.bsa


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Credits: [/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
--------------------
Thanks to Bethesda for creating skyrim and the Creation kit!
Thanks to cgtextures.com
\"One or more textures on this 3D-model have been created with images from CGTextures.com. These images may not be redistributed by default. Please visit www.cgtextures.com for more information\"
Thanks to skyrimnexus
Thanks to all creators of blender
Thanks to all creators of niftools
and thanks to the great developers of the old Gothic RPG, for inspiring me to work on this mod!



[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Licensing:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Please contact me, if you want to use, or change any part of the mod but at least give me credit for the work. (Youre welcome to use it in your very own mod - but please contact me)

For all objects modified with base skyrim resources: all rights reserved to bethesda softworks
author: JackoO
